S.FORM: kakiliman balucu' a masatedep, duma a ngangan saicelang nu balucu' a msatedep, kateng a masatedep ku balucu' "te yu: Herzinsuffizienz Herzschwäche, yin yu: heart failure, saadidiay a suliten: HF", i hekalay a kamu sa mahaymaway a malawpesay a balucu' "chronic heart failure, CHF", mayda u yu sie sin a balucu' a malawpes "congestive heart failure"; anu u balucu' caay pakacudu tu tangay a idang pabeli tu sakaydih nu udip, a mutahkal ku a masatedepay nu balucu'. a masatedepay nu balucu' a imelang idaw ku anu muhanhan caykadayum, anu tadamanglu atu mabudus ku kuku'. anu macahiyu ku hanhan micidek i nipiundu, anu mutalienang atu mabiyi sangdep dayum sa, mangle. i nama hiniyay a imelang sawni mipulu' tu nipitiyung nu mudekuay atu dimata nu undu, anu kapakapah ku nipikuwan, sataneng tu ku nipiundu. ( :Herzinsuffizienz Herzschwäche :heart failure :HF) (chronic heart failure,CHF) (congestive heart failure) . , . , . .
